backend/main.mo: Implements user profiles and smartwatch dataset storage with access‑controlled CRUD and filtering queries.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature definitions, related files, components, and test IDs for the smartwatch data application.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten 1–2 sentence summaries for all frontend files.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide detailing local and mainnet IC setup, build steps, troubleshooting, and verification.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color tokens, dark mode variables, and global theming.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point loading fonts and mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/scripts/publish-ic.sh: Automated script that builds and deploys backend and frontend canisters to local or IC networks.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app sets up React Query, auth gating, profile setup, and navigation between import, dashboard, datasets, and dataset details views.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Login screen prompting users to authenticate via Internet Identity and showing feature highlights.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Form for first‑time users to submit a profile name and save it via mutation with basic validation and error handling.
frontend/src/components/site/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying app branding, feature list, privacy notes, and a referral link with dynamic year and hostname.
frontend/src/components/site/Header.tsx: Header providing navigation, branding, and login/logout controls with desktop and mobile layouts.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/Dashboar: Dashboard allowing users to pick a dataset, filter by date range, and view computed metrics with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/features/datasets/DatasetDe: Displays details for a selected dataset, computes derived metrics, and supports JSON export.
frontend/src/features/datasets/DatasetsP: Lists all user datasets with basic info and provides navigation to dataset detail pages.
Handles file upload, parsing CSV/JSON smartwatch data, and saving new datasets.
frontend/src/features/import/ImportPrevi: Shows a tabular preview of parsed smartwatch records before import.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout handling, and persisted identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file for potential query hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useSmartwatchDatasets: React Query hooks for fetching, adding, and filtering smartwatch datasets and managing user profiles.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and a full light/dark OKLCH color system plus base typography styles.
frontend/src/lib/smartwatch/analytics.ts: Provides date‑range filtering and computes aggregated smartwatch metrics such as steps, heart rate, calories, and sleep.
frontend/src/lib/smartwatch/exportJson.t: Converts a smartwatch dataset to a clean JSON export and triggers a file download.
frontend/src/lib/smartwatch/fieldMapping: Maps various field name variants to normalized smartwatch metric keys.
frontend/src/lib/smartwatch/importParser: Parses smartwatch CSV/JSON data into normalized records with warnings and unmapped field tracking.
frontend/src/lib/smartwatch/model.ts: Defines TypeScript models for parsed smartwatch records, datasets, and parsing results.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, OKLCH color tokens, typography, and plugins.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Sets up Vite with React, environment variable injection, path aliasing, build settings, and a dev proxy.
project_state.json: Holds the project’s current state, including schema info, image requirements, and a list of defined features with requirement IDs and versions.
